title: Managing League Team 101

embed.description: What kind of team do you want or to be a part of? What kind of team you have is up to you if you're creating a team. Will they meme? Joke around? Have fun? Be serious? Use this time to improve? Be a mix? Will they win OOL?

body:
Hey guys,

Its LSD. 

I have written an basic article for players that want to learn how to manage a team. This is more for OOL teams, not really OCS + as there is a lot more involed like contracts etc... (But its a really good base of how everything works)

This is just a starting point to help you become a manager or be a better manager. Who wouldn't want to be Reggie? :O 

Hope you enjoy! 

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
